title: Bloomberg - Are you a robot?
COVID-19: These are India’s worst affected states with the highest number of infections
description: As of Friday morning (April 9), the total number of COVID-19 cases stood at 1,30,60,542 and 1,67,642 total deaths in India.India recorded 1,31,968 new COVID-19 cases and 780 fatalities in the last 24 hours.Maharashtra tops the list of most Coronavirus-affected states with 32,29,547 confirmed cases and 5,21,317 active cases.The overall number of COVID-19 cases in India has surpassed the 13 million mark and recorded 1,67,642 fatalities, so far.India has recorded 1,31,968 new COVID-19 cases and 780 new fatalities in the last 24 hours, continuing to cross the 1-lakh mark in daily numbers of active cases.Maharashtra tops the list of most Coronavirus-affected states in India with 5,21,317 active cases and total 57,028 deaths, so far.India is the third most affected country in the world with 1,30,60,542 COVID-19 cases and 1,67,642 fatalities.These are top 10 most Corona-affected states in India with highest number of COVID-19 cases:
